verses.verse: And thou shalt make <WH6213> an altar <WH4196> to burn <WH4729> incense <WH7004> upon: of shittim <WH7848> wood <WH6086> shalt thou make <WH6213> it.

A cubit <WH520> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a cubit <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> thereof; foursquare <WH7251> shall it be: <WH1961> and two cubits <WH520> shall be the height <WH6967> thereof: the horns <WH7161> thereof shall be of <WH4480> the same.

And thou shalt overlay <WH6823> it with pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> <WH853> the top <WH1406> thereof, and the sides <WH7023> thereof round about, <WH5439> and the horns <WH7161> thereof; and thou shalt make <WH6213> unto it a crown <WH2213> of gold <WH2091> round about. <WH5439>

And two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> rings <WH2885> shalt thou make <WH6213> to it under <WH4480> <WH8478> the crown <WH2213> of it, by <WH5921> the two <WH8147> corners <WH6763> thereof, upon <WH5921> the two <WH8147> sides <WH6654> of it shalt thou make <WH6213> it; and they shall be <WH1961> for places <WH1004> for the staves <WH905> to bear <WH5375> it withal. <WH1992>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH853> the staves <WH905> of shittim <WH7848> wood, <WH6086> and overlay <WH6823> them with gold. <WH2091>

And thou shalt put <WH5414> it before <WH6440> the veil <WH6532> that <WH834> is by <WH5921> the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> before <WH6440> the mercy seat <WH3727> that <WH834> is over <WH5921> the testimony, <WH5715> where <WH834> <WH8033> I will meet <WH3259> with thee.

And Aaron <WH175> shall burn <WH6999> thereon <WH5921> sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004> every morning: <WH1242> <WH1242> when he dresseth <WH3190> <WH853> the lamps, <WH5216> he shall burn incense <WH6999> upon it.

And when Aaron <WH175> lighteth <WH5927> <WH853> the lamps <WH5216> at <WH996> even, <WH6153> he shall burn incense <WH6999> upon it, a perpetual <WH8548> incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> throughout your generations. <WH1755>

Ye shall offer <WH5927> no <WH3808> strange <WH2114> incense <WH7004> thereon, <WH5921> nor burnt sacrifice, <WH5930> nor meat offering; <WH4503> neither <WH3808> shall ye pour <WH5258> drink offering <WH5262> thereon. <WH5921>

And Aaron <WH175> shall make an atonement <WH3722> upon <WH5921> the horns <WH7161> of it once <WH259> in a year <WH8141> with the blood <WH4480> <WH1818> of the sin offering <WH2403> of atonements: <WH3725> once <WH259> in the year <WH8141> shall he make atonement <WH3722> upon <WH5921> it throughout your generations: <WH1755> it <WH1931> is most holy <WH6944> <WH6944> unto the LORD. <WH3068>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

When <WH3588> thou takest <WH5375> <WH853> the sum <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> after their number, <WH6485> then shall they give <WH5414> every man <WH376> a ransom <WH3724> for his soul <WH5315> unto the LORD, <WH3068> when thou numberest <WH6485> them; that there be <WH1961> no <WH3808> plague <WH5063> among them, when thou numberest <WH6485> them.

This <WH2088> they shall give, <WH5414> every one <WH3605> that passeth <WH5674> among <WH5921> them that are numbered, <WH6485> half <WH4276> a shekel <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary: <WH6944> (a shekel <WH8255> is twenty <WH6242> gerahs: ) <WH1626> a half <WH4276> shekel <WH8255> shall be the offering <WH8641> of the LORD. <WH3068>

Every one <WH3605> that passeth <WH5674> among <WH5921> them that are numbered, <WH6485> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH4480> <WH1121> and above, <WH4605> shall give <WH5414> an offering <WH8641> unto the LORD. <WH3068>

The rich <WH6223> shall not <WH3808> give more, <WH7235> and the poor <WH1800> shall not <WH3808> give less <WH4591> than half <WH4480> <WH4276> a shekel, <WH8255> when they give <WH5414> <WH853> an offering <WH8641> unto the LORD, <WH3068> to make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> your souls. <WH5315>

And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> the atonement <WH3725> money <WH3701> of <WH4480> <WH854> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and shalt appoint <WH5414> it for <WH5921> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation; <WH4150> that it may be <WH1961> a memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> to make an atonement <WH3722> for <WH5921> your souls. <WH5315>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Thou shalt also make <WH6213> a laver <WH3595> of brass, <WH5178> and his foot <WH3653> also of brass, <WH5178> to wash <WH7364> withal: and thou shalt put <WH5414> it between <WH996> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> and the altar, <WH4196> and thou shalt put <WH5414> water <WH4325> therein. <WH8033>
For Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall wash <WH7364> <WH853> their hands <WH3027> and their feet <WH7272> thereat: <WH4480>

When they go <WH935> into <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> they shall wash <WH7364> with water, <WH4325> that they die <WH4191> not; <WH3808> or <WH176> when they come near <WH5066> to <WH413> the altar <WH4196> to minister, <WH8334> to burn <WH6999> offering made by fire <WH801> unto the LORD: <WH3068>

So they shall wash <WH7364> their hands <WH3027> and their feet, <WH7272> that they die <WH4191> not: <WH3808> and it shall be <WH1961> a statute <WH2706> forever <WH5769> to them, even to him and to his seed <WH2233> throughout their generations. <WH1755>
Moreover the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Take <WH3947> thou <WH859> also unto thee principal <WH7218> spices, <WH1314> of pure <WH1865> myrrh <WH4753> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> shekels, and of sweet <WH1314> cinnamon <WH7076> half so much, <WH4276> even two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> shekels, and of sweet <WH1314> calamus <WH7070> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> shekels,
And of cassia <WH6916> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> shekels, after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> and of oil <WH8081> olive <WH2132> a hin: <WH1969>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> it an oil <WH8081> of holy <WH6944> ointment, <WH4888> an ointment <WH7545> compound <WH4842> after the art <WH4639> of the apothecary: <WH7543> it shall be <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil. <WH8081>
And thou shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH853> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> therewith, and the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715>
And the table <WH7979> and all <WH3605> his vessels, <WH3627> and the candlestick <WH4501> and his vessels, <WH3627> and the altar <WH4196> of incense, <WH7004>
And the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> with all <WH3605> his vessels, <WH3627> and the laver <WH3595> and his foot. <WH3653>
And thou shalt sanctify <WH6942> them, that they may be <WH1961> most holy: <WH6944> <WH6944> whatsoever <WH3605> toucheth <WH5060> them shall be holy. <WH6942>
And thou shalt anoint <WH4886> Aaron <WH175> and his sons, <WH1121> and consecrate <WH6942> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office. <WH3547>

And thou shalt speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> This <WH2088> shall be <WH1961> a holy <WH6944> anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081> unto me throughout your generations. <WH1755>

Upon <WH5921> man's <WH120> flesh <WH1320> shall it not <WH3808> be poured, <WH3251> neither <WH3808> shall ye make <WH6213> any other like it, <WH3644> after the composition <WH4971> of it: it <WH1931> is holy, <WH6944> and it shall be <WH1961> holy <WH6944> unto you.

Whosoever <WH376> <WH834> compoundeth <WH7543> any like it, <WH3644> or whosoever <WH834> putteth <WH5414> any of <WH4480> it upon <WH5921> a stranger, <WH2114> shall even be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Take <WH3947> unto thee sweet spices, <WH5561> stacte, <WH5198> and onycha, <WH7827> and galbanum; <WH2464> these sweet spices <WH5561> with pure <WH2134> frankincense: <WH3828> of each <WH905> shall there be <WH1961> a like <WH905> weight:
And thou shalt make <WH6213> it a perfume, <WH7004> a confection <WH7545> after the art <WH4639> of the apothecary, <WH7543> tempered together, <WH4414> pure <WH2889> and holy: <WH6944>

And thou shalt beat <WH7833> some of <WH4480> it very small, <WH1854> and put <WH5414> of <WH4480> it before <WH6440> the testimony <WH5715> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> where <WH834> <WH8033> I will meet <WH3259> with thee: it shall be <WH1961> unto you most holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

And as for the perfume <WH7004> which <WH834> thou shalt make, <WH6213> ye shall not <WH3808> make <WH6213> to yourselves according to the composition <WH4971> thereof: it shall be <WH1961> unto thee holy <WH6944> for the LORD. <WH3068>
Whosoever <WH376> <WH834> shall make <WH6213> like unto that, <WH3644> to smell <WH7306> thereto, shall even be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH4480> <WH5971>
